title: Did DOJ Propose Rollback of Defendants’ Rights During Pandemic?
subtitle: Any changes affecting constitutional guarantees afforded federal criminal defendants in the U.S. would ultimately be up to Congress.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The U.S. Department of Justice under Trump has proposed granting federal judges broad authority to pause court proceedings during a national emergency, effectively allowing defendants to be detained indefinitely until the emergency is deemed over.
